component.text: Verificación de las interfaces OSPFv3 del R1
Verificación de las interfaces OSPFv3 en el R2 y el R3

component.feedback: *** Debe introducir el comando exacto y completo.***
component.existingcommands: Verifique la configuración de las interfaces OSPFv3 para el R2 con el formato resumido.

command.deviceresponse:
Interface PID Area Intf ID Cost State Nbrs F/C
Se0/0/1 10 0 7 647 P2P 1/1
Se0/0/0 10 0 6 647 P2P 1/1
Gi0/0 10 0 3 10 DR 0/0
R2#
command.instruction: Muestre la información completa de la interfaz OSPFv3 serial0/0/1.

command.deviceresponse:
Serial0/0/1 is up, line protocol is up
Link Local Address FE80::2, Interface ID 7
Area 0, Process ID 10, Instance ID 0, Router ID 2.2.2.2
Network Type POINT_TO_POINT, Cost: 647
Transmit Delay is 1 sec, State POINT_TO_POINT
Timer intervals configured, Hello 10, Dead 40, Wait 40,
Retransmit 5
Hello due in 00:00:01
Graceful restart helper support enabled
Index 1/3/3, flood queue length 0
Next 0x0(0)/0x0(0)/0x0(0)
Last flood scan length is 2, maximum is 4
Last flood scan time is 0 msec, maximum is 0 msec
Neighbor Count is 1, Adjacent neighbor count is 1
Adjacent with neighbor 3.3.3.3
Suppress hello for 0 neighbor(s)
R2#
command.instruction: Ahora configure el router R3. Verifique la configuración de las interfaces OSPFv3 para el R3 con el formato resumido.

command.deviceresponse:
Interface PID Area Intf ID Cost State Nbrs F/C
Se0/0/1 10 0 7 647 P2P 1/1
Se0/0/0 10 0 6 647 P2P 1/1
Gi0/0 10 0 3 10 DR 0/0
R3#
command.instruction: Muestre la información completa de la interfaz OSPFv3 serial0/0/0.

command.deviceresponse:
Serial0/0/0 is up, line protocol is up
Link Local Address FE80::3, Interface ID 6
Area 0, Process ID 10, Instance ID 0, Router ID 3.3.3.3
Network Type POINT_TO_POINT, Cost: 647
Transmit Delay is 1 sec, State POINT_TO_POINT
Timer intervals configured, Hello 10, Dead 40, Wait 40,
Retransmit 5
Hello due in 00:00:06
Graceful restart helper support enabled
Index 1/2/2, flood queue length 0
Next 0x0(0)/0x0(0)/0x0(0)
Last flood scan length is 2, maximum is 4
Last flood scan time is 0 msec, maximum is 0 msec
Neighbor Count is 1, Adjacent neighbor count is 1
Adjacent with neighbor 1.1.1.1
Suppress hello for 0 neighbor(s)
R3#
command.instruction: Verificó correctamente las interfaces OSPFv3.
